title: The Bill for Afghanistan
description: American President Joe Biden has said the war in Afghanistan cost more than $2 trillion. Todd Harrison, a senior fellow at the Centre for Strategic International Studies helps us unpick what’s included in this figure.
itunes:subtitle: Did the war in Afghanistan cost the US $2 trillion?
itunes:summary: American President Joe Biden has said the war in Afghanistan cost more than $2 trillion. Todd Harrison, a senior fellow at the Centre for Strategic International Studies helps us unpick what’s included in this figure.
itunes:author: BBC Radio 4
